subject: Project Status Report – Due Today
body: Hi, please send me your full status report for Sprint 12 by end of day. Include completed tasks, blockers, and next steps. Thanks!

subject: Need Slide Deck for Friday’s Demo
body: Can you prepare the presentation slides for Friday’s client demo? Please send me the first draft by tomorrow morning.

subject: Website Banner Update Required
body: We need to update the home-page banner for the new launch. Please apply the new creative assets and publish it before Monday.

subject: Budget Approval Needed
body: Please review the attached budget proposal and approve it before the 15th. Let me know if you need revisions.

subject: Urgent: Authentication Bug
body: Users are unable to reset their passwords. Please investigate this issue and deploy a fix as soon as possible.

subject: Monthly Timesheet Reminder
body: Hi, this is a reminder to submit your monthly timesheet before 6 PM today.

subject: Schedule Next Sprint Planning
body: Can you schedule our Sprint Planning meeting for Wednesday at 10 AM? Ensure the agenda draft is shared beforehand.

subject: PR Review Needed
body: Please review PR #482 and provide your comments today so we can merge before release freeze.

subject: Documentation Update
body: The new analytics endpoint needs documentation. Add usage examples and update the API reference by Friday.

subject: Mandatory Security Training
body: You must complete the annual cybersecurity training by the end of this week. Certificates will be checked on Monday.

subject: Client Feedback Needed
body: Could you review the client's message and send me your feedback so I can finalize the response?

subject: Product Roadmap Update
body: Please update the roadmap to include this month’s deliverables and share the new version with the leadership team.

subject: Payment Failure
body: A customer’s subscription payment failed. Can you check their account logs and resolve it today?

subject: Meeting Recording Upload
body: Please upload yesterday’s meeting recording to the shared drive and notify the team once done.

subject: Release Notes Required
body: We need the release notes for version 3.4 finalized by tonight. Include bug fixes, new features, and known issues.

subject: Git Cleanup
body: Reminder: please delete unused Git branches older than 60 days. Cleanup required before next sprint.

subject: New Hire Onboarding
body: Please send the onboarding checklist to the new intern and guide them through the first-day setup.

subject: UI Mockups Review
body: We need your approval on the new UI mockups. Please review the Figma file and share your comments.

subject: Database Backup Required
body: Please run the full database backup tonight and confirm once completed.

subject: Competitor Analysis Request
body: Can you prepare a short competitor analysis report for tomorrow’s meeting? Include product strengths and weaknesses.
